original_text: Thus she committed her whoredoms with them, with all them that were the chosen men of Assyria, and with all on whom she doted: with all their idols she defiled herself.
korean_text: 그가 앗수르 사람들 가운데에 잘 생긴 그 모든 자들과 행음하고 누구를 연애하든지 그들의 모든 우상으로 자신을 더럽혔으며

sentences.original_text: Thus she committed her whoredoms with them
with all them that were the chosen men of Assyria
and with all on whom she doted
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그녀가 사랑에 빠진 모든 사람과 함께

sentences.original_text: with all their idols she defiled herself
